Texts.Chs: 我听说赫克斯文II和欧米克隆 · 忒塔III都失去联系了。
Texts.Eng: I hear that Huxven II and Omicron Theta III have both gone dark.

Texts.Chs: 我的家园被不知名的敌人消灭了。我要复仇。
Texts.Eng: My homeworld was wiped out by the unknown enemy. I want vengeance.

Texts.Chs: 如果没有针对袭击的军事打击，那大地保护团可就有点显得软弱无力了。
Texts.Eng: Without a military strike in response to the attacks, the Protectorate will look weak.
